title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens higher as focus shifts to Fed
text:
US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens higher as focus shifts to Fed

Stock Markets 40 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 15:36)

© Reuters. US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens higher as focus shifts to Fed Oct 30 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks opened modestly higher on Wednesday as investors digested another set of earnings reports ahead of a widely expected interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve later in the day. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 39.29 points, or 0.15%, at the open to 27,110.71. The S&P 500 opened higher by 2.85 points, or 0.09%, at 3,039.74. The Nasdaq Composite gained 7.42 points, or 0.09%, to 8,284.28 at the opening bell.

US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens higher as focus shifts to Fed
